page.title: 12LANGUAGE & LIFESTYLES
page.content: The native language is{English} spoken with a{Cheshire}accent.There are many people who move from different places around the country. It is a popular area for people moving with jobs to round about towns and cities,for instance{Liverpool }and {Runcorn}therefore there are many different accents. In this area live people of many different ages,as it is a country area not everybody can find a job in their home,many people travel to nearby towns to work in factories, schools, shops and various other jobs. We asked one hundred people how many cars they had . The average was two.the results were: {No cars 4% One car 26% {Two cars 65% Three cars 5%
